title: Buried treasure
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Puppet films
description: Episode of Series "Johnson and friends". Johnson, the courageous pink elephant, leads his friends in 6 new stories. 1. "Baby of the family" Squeaky, the battered robot, was the baby of the toyroom, but also the strongest. How can the others protect her from dangerous games? 2. "The big freeze" It was the coldest day ever in Michael's bedroom, so how will the toys get warm? 3. "Secrets" McDuff, the cheeky concertina, has a secret and all the other toys are desperate to know what it is. 4. "Operation Squeaky" Squeaky is broken and how will the other toys be able to fix her? 5. "Crying wolf" Diesel the dump truck is taught a lesson when he plays a nasty trick. 6. "Buried treasure" The toys set sail in search of buried treasure.
related_objects: Series; S01190; Johnson and friends; Active; 1990
